page.title: 17LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content:
GULLANE SPORTS CLUBS Badminton - Mon,Thurs through winter Bowling - Every day through summer Football - Saturday through winter Golf - Every day throughout year Keep Fit - Tues,Thurs through winter Netball - Alt. Wed/Thur all year Squash - Mon to Fri through winter Swimming - Tuesday through winter
YOUTH GROUPS OTHER GROUPS Beavers Bridge Club Boys' Brigade Drama Club Boys'Club Housewives Register Brownies Men's Club Cubs Mother/Toddler Group Guides Over Sixties'Club PLayGroup Women's Guild Scouts W.R.I. Scripture Union Sunday School
